resources.string: Please, enter the server location (including the http/https part).\n\nExample: https://demo.2fauth.app

The server location you specified is not secure.\n\nWe strongly recommend that you move it to a secure location (you may need to install traefik, nginx-proxy, or similar) except for testing purposes and if you are aware of the risks.

Due to the server location change, for your safety, access token was also removed.

Additionally, we recommend that you delete any previously downloaded account data from the app.

Do you want to delete the data now?
When changing the server location, we recommend that you delete any previously downloaded account data from the app.\n\nDo you want to delete the data now?
Due to the server location update, for your safety, access token was also removed
The server location has been updated
Click to set a new token
Click to set the token value

Please, enter the token value.\n\nTo obtain a token go the server URL in a web browser, log in to your user account, navigate to "OAuth Settings" under "Settings" and finally click "generate a token" then copy the value and paste here.

The server access token has been updated.

Additionally, we recommend that you delete any previously downloaded account data from the app.

Do you want to delete the data now?
The server access token has been updated
There are unsynced changes that will be lost if you continue with this operation without first performing a data synchronization.\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
Last synchronization was on %2$s but not completed due to the following error: %1$s.\n\n%3$s

plurals.name: sync_details
plurals.item: The last sync was on %2$s and one accounts were loaded.\n\n%3$s
The last sync was on %2$s and %1$d accounts were loaded.\n\n%3$s
The last sync was on %2$s and %1$d accounts were loaded.\n\n%3$s

resources.string: Sort accounts by usage (list first the last accounts for which an OTP code has been displayed) instead of just sorting by service name
Removes last used data from accounts and sorting is reset
The name of the group to which the account belongs will be displayed, if applicable.
Minimizes the app when an OTP code is copied to the Clipboard
Make phone vibrate as feedback for some actions
Do not allow to take screenshots from the accounts list
The change will be applied the next time you start the app
Automatically hide the OTP code after a complete display cycle (you must press it again to display the next one)
Require a PIN code to access the App

Please enter the PIN you will use to access the app.

PIN length will be from 4 to 8 digits.

You will not be able to access the app if you forget it.
Please, enter new PIN again.\n\nRemember that you will not be able to access the app if you forget it.
The PIN you\'ve entered isn\'t valid
The PIN and it\'s repeat do not match
Require user\'s fingerprint to access the App
Click to view the Open Source License agreements of the external software libraries we use
Open the app\'s GitHub repository to get information about the latest releases, report bugs, or contribute to development
When you enter the app, it will connect to the repository to check for updates, downloading and installing them if necessary.
You\'re using version %1$s of the app, but version %2$s has already been released. Would you like to update now?
Enter a text to filter accounts…
